creator: Linkbase Technology Limited
descriptionHtml:
CoinCatch is the leading crypto exchange platform for crypto derivatives trading. Buy BTC and ETH at CoinCatch and begin your crypto trading journey now!

With CoinCatch exchange, you can:
•Trade futures: USDT-M, Coin-M
•Trade spot: Supports most major currencies.
•Experience a secure and stable platform.
•Use advanced futures functions, including cross and isolated margins, and trailing stop orders.
•Enjoy industry-leading liquidity and depth.
•Get tech support 24/7, all year round

Futures trading
Our futures trading supports USDT-M, USDC-M and Coin-M futures. Buy (long) and sell (short) on Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), and other cryptocurrencies. Level up your trades with advanced futures functions, including cross and isolated margins, and trailing stop orders.

Spot trading
We provide most major cryptocurrencies and more than 400+ currencies will be supported in the future.

Supported assets
Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Litecoin (LTC), Polkadot (DOT), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), Shiba Inu (SHIB), Dogecoin (DOGE), Tron (TRX), Uniswap (UNI), Ripple (XRP), Polygon (MATIC), Filecoin (FIL), and many more.

Deposits
Withdraw crypto from other cryptocurrency exchanges using TRX, ETH, BSC, ETH, BTC, or XRP chains/networks. Copy the address or scan the QR code to deposit in the safest and simplest way.

24/7 Customer Service
We’re here to support your crypto trading experience. For any assistance with your trades or transfers, contact us at support@CoinCatch.com and we’ll get back to you as soon as possible.. We’re also open to any feedback on improving your experience on our platform.


Official website: https://www.CoinCatch.com
Privacy Policy: https://coincatch.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/5770359937423
descriptionShort: Crypto Exchange Worldwide for Futures Trading. Trade BTC, ETH & XRP.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1、API management feature has been added. You can view, edit, and delete APIs on the APP.
2、Some bugs have been fixed.

•Enjoy industry-leading liquidity and depth.
•Get tech support 24/7, all year round

Futures trading
Our futures trading supports USDT-M, USDC-M and Coin-M futures. Buy (long) and sell (short) on Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), and other cryptocurrencies. Level up your trades with advanced futures functions, including cross and isolated margins, and trailing stop orders.

Spot trading
We provide most major cryptocurrencies and more than 400+ currencies will be supported in the future.

Supported assets
Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Litecoin (LTC), Polkadot (DOT), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), Shiba Inu (SHIB), Dogecoin (DOGE), Tron (TRX), Uniswap (UNI), Ripple (XRP), Polygon (MATIC), Filecoin (FIL), and many more.

Deposits
Withdraw crypto from other cryptocurrency exchanges using TRX, ETH, BSC, ETH, BTC, or XRP chains/networks. Copy the address or scan the QR code to deposit in the safest and simplest way.

24/7 Customer Service
We’re here to support your crypto trading experience. For any assistance with your trades or transfers, contact us at support@CoinCatch.com and we’ll get back to you as soon as possible.. We’re also open to any feedback on improving your experience on our platform.
